Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers
Items.MatterName: Monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type, and to repeal sections 21-145.1 and 21-145.2 of such code in relation thereto
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness
Items.MatterName: Expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to income and work requirements for rental assistance
Items.MatterName: Income and work requirements for rental assistance.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Mayor’s veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 229-A of 2022, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 229-A - Monthly rental assistance payments for households with rental assistance vouchers.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Mayor’s veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 878-A of 2023, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type, and to repeal sections 21-145.1 and 21-145.2 of such code in relation thereto.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 878-A - Prohibiting the department of social services from requiring an applicant for a rental assistance voucher to have resided or reside in a shelter of any type.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Mayor’s veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 893-A of 2023, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 893-A -Expanding eligibility for rental assistance to any applicant at risk of eviction or experiencing homelessness.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Mayor’s veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 894-A of 2023, A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to income and work requirements for rental assistance.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 894-A - Income and work requirements for rental assistance.
